author: woonsan
msg: Adding concurrent servlet request handling decoration for some platform (possibly for WebSphere 6.1.x) where the underlying request object of the container could have been designed in a non-thread-safe way. This can make problems when parallel rendering option is enabled.
Using cglib to generate proxy object based on class.
By the way, the asm dependencies have been removed because they are not explicitly used and the cglib 2.x conflicts with asm 2.x. The cglib 2.x includes asm 1.5.x transitively.
TODO: test with various application server platform with parallel rendering option.
